attributes.action: Ban the Islam4UK March in Wootten Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British Public, demand that the Prime Minister immediately bans the march by this radical islamic group in any location in the UK; and further, that he considers making such groups illegal and deporting any members of such organisations or removing their entitlement to benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
